data.text:
Hayashi Yoshiki (林佳樹), better known by his stage name YOSHIKI, is a drummer, pianist, composer, songwriter, fashion designer, co-founder of X JAPAN and drummer of S.K.I.N..

He is the producer of the boy group/band project XY.

Profile[]

Name: Hayashi Yoshiki (林佳樹)

Stage Name: YOSHIKI

Birthday:November 20, 1965 (age 58)

Birthplace:Tateyama, Chiba, Japan

Zodiac: Scorpio

Height: 175cm

Discography[]

[1991.12.12] Yoshiki Selection

[1993.04.21] Eternal Melody

[2005.03.23] ETERNAL MELODY II

[2013.08.27] YOSHIKI CLASSICAL
